remarks: Condition for the trace of a Cauchy filter base to be a Cauchy filter base for the restricted uniform structure.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Jan-2018.)
statement: trcfilu $p |- ( ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) /\ ( F e. ( CauFilU ` U ) /\ -. (/) e. ( F |`t A ) ) /\ A C_ X ) -> ( F |`t A ) e. ( CauFilU ` ( U |`t ( A X. A ) ) ) ) $.
